name: Dongning Guo
content: Guo, Dongning @ Northwestern Dongning Guo Professor of Electrical and Computer Engineering (ECE) Professor of Computer Science (by courtesy) McCormick School of Engineering and Applied Science Northwestern University, Evanston, Illinois. I am affiliated with the Communications and Networking Laboratory and the Institute for Data, Econometrics, Algorithms, and Learning (IDEAL). Email: dGuo AT northwestern DOT edu Research interests: Blockchain and decentralized consensus, wireless communications, information theory, communication networks, signal processing and machine learning. To learn about research outcomes of my group, visit Google Scholar or Research Gate. Mailing address: 2145 Sheridan Road ECE Dept Evanston, IL 60208 U.S.A. This site: http://users.ece.northwestern.edu/~dguo/ D. Guo
